case.state: I'm down for either one, Panty.
Strip poker? I love strip poker!
Now this is my kind of day off.
Arash! Wasn't expecting to see you here! (You wouldn't guess it, but this guy's scary good at poker!)
I sense a challenge incoming...well, that just makes things more fun.
(Arash is here? I'll have to up my game.)
I like the way you think, Misty!
Good thing I have no shame, then.
As if I needed to be any more aroused at the mere thought of playing this game.
Does that butterfly even have any clothes to take off?
A butterfly? Well, that's not what I expected.
Damn. I didn't come here for bugs.
Wasn't expecting a ball of light to turn up to a strip poker game.
Now this is going to be fun.
Ah, strip poker. Maybe it's a cliche for a half-incubus to like this game, but I like it anyway.
Now that's what I like to hear, Streaming-chan!
Hmm. This could go either way.
This is going to be interesting.
Well, games that just breeze by smoothly are boring anyway.
Let's meet up sometime and swap stories. I've got so many.
Oh, you bet I'm an adventurer!
I heard that first bit, Arash!
That's not what it means at all...
Don't get me started on that or we'll be here all week.
Marriage isn't for me, and why would I kill someone I could fuck?
You say that like you're going to win.
Damn. And here I was enjoying the spotlight.
Good, that's what I was going for!
That's the look I wanted, Kamina.
Huh, that's not the reaction I usually get. Sure I helped save the world, but I'm brimming with mayhem too.
I may be a hero, but I'm no goody two shoes.
*bows dramatically* Thank you, thank you, I'll be here all night~
Oh, you'd better believe I'm an expert.
Anyone can strip, but it takes practice to make it look good.
Mostly just because I like the look.
I like the looks on the other Servants' faces when I decide to wear a dress.
I'm proud of my hair! Cutting it would be a waste.
It's good for messing with people.
You are *so* going to eat those words.
Time to strip, then. Also known as one of the most fun parts.
You guys are surprisingly good at this.
I'd better step up my game.
Been a while since I've played against such skilled opponents.
What can I say? I'm proud of my appearance.
I love this game. Is that so hard to understand?
Since when are incubi known for being shy?
I've worn dresses now and then. I'd do it again in a heartbeat.
Much as I'd love to just show off to you guys, I ought to start simple.
Good things come to those who wait~
My last small thing. Nice going.
You're one win away from seeing some good stuff.
You've run me out of little things. Nice work.
Don't worry, I'm not big on accessories. Let's do this.
Hmm, how about my boots next?
Are you ready to see a shirtless half-incubus?
My robes are in the wash, but hey, this is easier to take off.
Good going, guys. I'm nearly out of clothes, but that doesn't mean I'm out of the fun.
Well, time to get naked. Not that I mind at all.
Don't you want to see a naked half-incubus Grand Caster?
Don't worry about my shame. I have none!
That's why I don't wear underwear. Stockings are so much more comfortable.
Finding underwear I actually fit in is a pain in the ass. Better to just go without.
"Not supposed to?" I'm a half-incubus Grand Caster. I do what I want.
I'm a Grand Caster and the son of a demon. I do what I want.
Because I don't want one. Simple as that.
I prefer to keep my options open.
Do you really think one person can satisfy a half-incubus?
I'd have one if I wanted one.
I'm just fine as I am.
No, but that'd be pretty cool.
The dragons I've gotten a close look at are actually pretty average for their body size.
Demon, actually. Half incubus, to be precise.
I'm a Heroic Spirit, and half-incubus. "Humanly possible" doesn't matter.
You say that as if "humanly possible" matters to a half-incubus Heroic Spirit.
I mean, I am part incubus...
After the game. I'd rather not hold things up.
Hard to find underwear in my size~
Well, it's a bit rude to make half Chaldea pick hair out of their teeth, isn't it?
When you get as much action as I do, it's good to be prepared.
I'm still surprised by people who don't shave.
Just the first of many more, I promise you. If you can keep beating me...
You'll have to keep that up if you want to see more.
Did I mention I love this game?
Not quite to the goods just yet!
Sorry, feet-lovers, but you'll need to try harder than that.
This isn't something you get to see often.
Think you can beat me again?
If you can beat me again, you deserve to see me shirtless.
Having fun? I know I am.
Having fun, guys? I sure am.
Yup, I'm not wearing underwear. Don't think you've beaten me just yet, though.
Who needs underwear with stockings like these?
Yes, I know this doesn't hide much of anything, and no, I don't care.
Looks like ~name~ is on the spot!
~name~, you know what time it is!
Even without an instinct for shenanigans, I know something cool's about to happen.
You name it, I've probably tried it.
Now that I'd like to see.
Shaved's nice, but hair's not a deal-breaker. I'm half-incubus, and we're not exactly picky!
Do you really think there's much of anything I'm not into?
Never had the opportunity to, but it might be interesting to try. Oh, who am I kidding, everything's interesting to try.
Because I felt like it! Do I need another reason?
Okay...that's a bit much, even for me. Wait, I've been out-kinkied by a random person?
I like poker, I like shenanigans, and I like sexy things. Why wouldn't I be here?
Oh, it takes a little warming up, but I'm flexible enough to suck myself.
I'm the best. Don't take my word for it, take at least half of Chaldea's.
I'd tell you, but we'd be here all month.
I usually top, but some variety's nice too.
Depends on my mood. Right now? Suck. Oh, who am I kidding, 99% of the time it's suck.
That's for me to know and you to figure out.
I'm not picky, but nothing beats holding someone in a mating press. Mmm, I can almost feel it...
Let's just say I've had plenty of practice.
Looks like ~name~ is on the spot!
~name~, you know what time it is!
Get brave already. I didn't come here for this.
Let's just deal the next round already!
(It might be funny to trip her...no, that's a little much, and I'd get in trouble anyway.)
Well that was a waste of time! Let's get on with the game!
Guess it's braver than an accessory.
Shenanigans that aren't my fault. It's a weird feeling.
He's like that. It's honestly sweet.
Yeah, I'm poker buddies with a snuggler.
Pretty sure hugs are the only thing Arash likes more than hummus.
Whatever. Let's get on with it.
Guess it's better than an accessory.
You put that on fast, Sonya. I'm impressed.
Whatever. Let's get on with it.
I knew you had it in you, ~name~!
Clever. Very clever. But your tray can't keep you in the game for good.
And here I thought I had you down to the wire.
The scar looks good on you!
I've come to like scars after so long on the Throne with only fellow Heroic Spirits for company.
Well that's...one way to take off makeup.
For the record, that wasn't me.
Let's get a look at you, ~name~.
I do wish I could take responsibility for that, though!
Haven't seen someone without nipples before. A little strange, but I have to admit I like the look~
I usually go for the ladies, but since when are incubi picky?
Think you've got what it takes to impress me, ~name~?
Yeah, I know some people like small, but I've got my own tastes.
I like the way you think, Arash. The important thing is to have fun.
*This* is how you beat Chaldea's unlikely reigning champion of strip poker. Just put him in a situation where losing would be more fun.
Hah! He's good at this game, but everyone has their weakness!
Wasn't expecting to find someone to rival me here.
Tease. I don't know whether to applaud or hit you with my staff.
Cute. Small's got its own charm.
Tease. I don't know whether I should applaud or hit you with my staff.
Hey, Gwen, want to compare knot-tying techniques sometime? Been looking to expand my repertoire.
Now that's a sight to see~
Ready, ~name~? I've been looking forward to this all night.
That is, as Master would say, a mood.
I know I'd do the same.
Unusual choice, but I like it.
I don't mind the view, heh.
You shave, too? Nice. Hit me up if you'd like any tips.
Oh, I just want to stroke that soft skin.
Always nice to find someone who shares my tastes!
Who let me anywhere near an innocent? Whatever, this is going to be fun.
Ooh, is that innocence I'm detecting?
Whoever put a half-incubus in the same game of strip poker as an innocent is about to find out why that's the best bad idea in existence.
Mmm, sweet innocence for the taking...
Someone looks a little naive...not for long though~
Arash? I think that's your cue.
And just where do you think you're going, Chihiro?
Hey, never let it be said I don't like the androgynous look. *shakes hair out*
I may usually go for the ladies, but I'm not picky.
Show us all how much you love it!
Remind me to try that grip sometime?
Don't worry, we're not about to get hit with a meteor.
Looks like you've got something clever in store.
Now here's a sight I've been looking forward to.
Now that was quite the display.
You're more than welcome to some of mine~
Now that's giving me some good ideas. Okay, probably bad ideas, but *fun* bad ideas.
Now that looks like it feels nice.
Are you sure we can't touch?
Remind me to try something like that sometime?
Telling Cu about this would be a terrible idea. I'm doing it.
Bet I could make you feel even better.
You're good at this, you know that?
Okay, I have *got* to try that sometime.
I've got to try that sometime.
Can't promise to forget~ But I'm not going to tell anyone.
Whatever I was expecting, it wasn't that.
*impressed whistle* Not many Servants could balance like that at the moment of finishing.
Damn, is that it? I was loving the show.
Got any more in you, ~name~? I'd love to see another round.
I should warn you: I'm a tough act to follow.
Think you can compare to a half-incubus?
I don't mind losing if it means I get to have fun.
This is going to be fun.
Now this is a good way to finish a game.
Still going strong! Gotta love incubus stamina!
What? Never seen a guy who thinks his ass is fun too?
Want to see how the real pros do it?
This is my favorite thing about being part incubus.
You can watch. In fact, I'd love if you watched.
Enjoy the show to your hearts' contents~
I'm not stopping just yet, but I think you can consider me forfeited.
I could do this all day. Not even exaggerating here - I've done it before.
This feels nice. This feels very nice.
What? Jealous I can go as long as I want?
Great game! Let's play again sometime!
That was great! Let's play again sometime!
Wow. You guys are good. Let's play again sometime.
I'm impressed. Let's play again sometime.
You messed with the wrong Heroic Spirit, Nami! Not that there's a right Heroic Spirit to mess with!
I don't know about the rest of you, but I had a blast!
Now that was a good way to spend a day off!
No worries. If things go really bad, I'm not called Grand Caster for nothing.
